body:
I had a duel in progress. I think the AI was thinking at the time, and I didn't feel like waiting because it looked like a lost game (3rd of 3). So I used "New duel".

My specs: Magarena 1.26, Debian Linux (Wheezy - testing)

Log below:

Saved duel config
Starting game...
CRASH REPORT FOR MAGARENA THREAD Thread[Thread-33149,1,main]
CREATED ON 2012/06/17 21:53:40
MAGARENA VERSION 1.26, JRE 1.6.0_24, OS Linux_3.1.0-1-amd64 amd64

Turn : 22  Phase : FirstMain  Step : Resolve  Player : Computer  Score : 0
0] Player : b0rsuk  Life : 12  Delayed : Total=0
   - Graveyard : Lord of the Unreal
   - Graveyard : Hedron Scrabbler
   - Graveyard : Isao, Enlightened Bushi
   - Graveyard : Spider Umbra
   - Graveyard : Negate
   - Graveyard : Cancel
   - Graveyard : Bountiful Harvest
   - Permanent : Rupture Spire  Tapped
   - Permanent : Elvish Visionary  Power : 1  Toughness : 1  Damage : 0
   - Permanent : Nessian Courser  Power : 1  Toughness : 1  Damage : 0
   - Permanent : Forest  Tapped
   - Permanent : Forest  Tapped
   - Permanent : Forest  Tapped
   - Permanent : Umara Raptor  Power : 2  Toughness : 2  Damage : 0
   - Permanent : Fortress Crab  Power : 1  Toughness : 6  Damage : 0
   - Permanent : Horned Turtle  Power : 1  Toughness : 4  Damage : 0
   - Permanent : Island  Tapped
   - Permanent : Seaside Citadel
1] Player : Computer  Life : 8  Delayed : Total=0
   - Hand : Ulamog's Crusher
   - Hand : Smash to Smithereens
   - Hand : Doom Blade
   - Hand : Mountain
   - Graveyard : Phyrexian Digester
   - Graveyard : Oona's Gatewarden
   - Graveyard : Rage Reflection
   - Permanent : Rupture Spire
   - Permanent : Gorgon Flail
   - Permanent : Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief  Power : 4  Toughness : 4  Damage : 0
   - Permanent : Swamp  Tapped
   - Permanent : Swamp  Tapped
   - Permanent : Swamp
   - Permanent : Mountain
   - Permanent : Mountain
   - Permanent : Keening Banshee  Power : 2  Toughness : 2  Damage : 0
   - Permanent : Severed Legion  Power : 2  Toughness : 2  Damage : 0
   - Permanent : Liliana's Specter  Power : 3  Toughness : 2  Damage : 0
Stack : 0
Score = 0

Exception from controller.runGame: magic.model.choice.MagicPlayChoiceResult cannot be cast to magic.model.target.MagicTarget
java.lang.ClassCastException: magic.model.choice.MagicPlayChoiceResult cannot be cast to magic.model.target.MagicTarget
        at magic.model.event.MagicEvent.getTarget(MagicEvent.java:193)
        at magic.model.event.MagicEvent.processTargetPermanent(MagicEvent.java:222)
        at magic.model.event.MagicEquipActivation.executeEvent(MagicEquipActivation.java:50)
        at magic.model.event.MagicEvent.executeEvent(MagicEvent.java:298)
        at magic.model.MagicGame.executeEvent(MagicGame.java:624)
        at magic.model.stack.MagicItemOnStack.resolve(MagicItemOnStack.java:111)
        at magic.model.action.MagicStackResolveAction.doAction(MagicStackResolveAction.java:13)
        at magic.model.MagicGame.doAction(MagicGame.java:484)
        at magic.model.phase.MagicPhase.executePhase(MagicPhase.java:42)
        at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:49)
        at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.evaluateGame(ArtificialWorker.java:128)
        at magic.ai.MMAB$ArtificialWorkerThread.run(MMAB.java:213)
author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)
title: The game crashed when starting a new duel

comments.body:
Another crash in 1.28 (attached)

I don't know if it's relevant, but sound is enabled and doesn't work (because the device is busy and I'm listening to radio).
comments.author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)

comments.body:
Crash in 1.28 (attached)

Now with the correct log.

**Attachment:** [crash.log](http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=229#hc2)
comments.author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)

content:
_From [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/) on June 18, 2012 16:53:03_

I had a duel in progress. I think the AI was thinking at the time, and I didn't feel like waiting because it looked like a lost game (3rd of 3). So I used "New duel".
